cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking west-northwest across the eastern Caribbean Sea toward southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, Cuba, and the eastern Gulf of Mexico; not forecast to turn toward the Mid-Atlantic within the 5-day window.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Hispaniola (near the Haiti–Dominican Republic border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for southern Haiti; Tropical Storm Watch for Grenada, Saba, Sint Eustatius, Jamaica, Dominica
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Barbados, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines; Tropical Storm Warning for Martinique, southern Dominican Republic, entire coast of Haiti
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands, southern Leeward Islands, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, Cuba, eastern Gulf Coast of the U.S.
weather_observation.wind: Little to no tropical-storm-force winds expected at the port through the next 5 days (≤ 3% chance of 34-kt winds).
weather_observation.other_hazards: None identified for port operations in the current 5-day outlook.
